ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 96 cores x 8 FP32/cycle (double-pumped AVX-512) = 768 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 96 cores x 4 FP64/cycle (double-pumped AVX-512) = 384 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: AVX-512 is double-pumped on Zen 4 (256-bit native, takes 2 cycles for 512-bit)

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at base_clock_mhz (2400 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Genoa (EPYC 9004 series). 96 Zen 4 cores (192 threads). TSMC 5nm. Chiplet design (12x 8-core CCDs). No AMX equivalent - uses VNNI for INT8. 12-channel DDR5-4800. PCIe 5.0 with 128 lanes. CXL 1.1+.
